channel.title: Where are the RS Private server data/accounts stored?
channel.description:
I don't know anything about how RuneScape private servers work except that the client uses Java.
I have done quite a bit of Java and am very familiar with PHP & MySQL.
I was wondering where are the RuneScape private server accounts and data (e.g. items, NPCs) stored?
Are they stored in a MySQL database?

item.title: Where are the RS Private server data/accounts stored?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Some servers use mysql, some use a binary file format, some use a cvs format.

Read full topic
item.source: Where are the RS Private server data/accounts stored?
